Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Nagle/Rosedale
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland  buses are temporarily rerouted via Nagle, Bryn Mawr, Austin, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Nagle/Rosedale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Nagle, Bryn Mawr, Austin, and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Nagle/Rosedale.

Allow extra travel time.
